document_data.caption: A map showing the city of Akota connected to the main road leading to Tajar.
document_data.name: Akota
document_data.comrefs: The city of Akota specifically only appears in the ''[[Forgotten Realms Interactive Atlas]]'', while ''[[Land of Fate]]'' indicates that Akota is a land beyond [[Zakhara]]. It seems likely but is not entirely clear that the exports in ''[[Golden Voyages]]'' refer to the country, not the city of Akota. If so, these goods would usually pass through the city of Akota as a trading post on route to [[Tajar]].
document_data.mainbody: '''Akota''' was the name of a small city found in [[west Zakhara]].{{Cite interactive atlas|?}}
document_data.Geography: Akota was sandwiched by the [[Range of the Marching Camels]] in the north and [[al-Suqut Mountains]] in the south. It was found southwest of the mighty [[High Desert]] along the coast of the [[Bahr al-Kibar]] where the caravan route from [[Tajar]] ended.
document_data.Activities: Akota exported [[gold]], [[slave]]s, wood, and exotic goods to the Land of Fate through an overland trade route crossing the southern [[High Desert]] to the city of Tajar.<ref group="note"  name="note1"/> Many inhabitants would speak the language [[Akotan]] next to [[Midani]], acquired through their trade contacts with the country of [[Akota]] beyond [[Zakhara]].
